subtract.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to take a number or an amount from a larger number or amount
subtract.translation[0].definitions[0].e: If you subtract 30 from 45, you get 15.
subtract.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to take a number or an amount from something larger
subtract.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Subtract 34% corporate tax from the total.
